actions.Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Lo:
A 20- foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater.
The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash
action as a bonus action.
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If
the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on
another target.

While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.
The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater. Water Breathing. The octopus
can breathe only underwater.
